articles.author: Dan Sheldon
articles.title: Manchester United investigating how Galatasaray fans had Old Trafford home tickets - The Athletic
articles.description:
Manchester United are investigating after a number of Galatasaray fans appeared to have tickets in the home section of Old Trafford during their Champions League game on Tuesday.
The Turkish side were surprise 3-2 winners in Manchester but during and after th…

articles.author: Christian Nimmervoll
articles.title: How the FIA went from seven F1 new team bids to Andretti - Motorsport.com
articles.description: The FIA's announcement this week that it has put forward Andretti Formula Racing to join the Formula 1 grid marked the end of a gruelling eight-month process.
articles.content: And while there remain some big challenges ahead, because Andretti still needs to agree a commercial deal with FOM to be allowed to race, it is the closest F1 has had to a new team entrant for a whil… [+10044 chars]
